LanguageData.Ammo_SPG9Rocket_HEAT.label: реактивна граната СПГ9 (Кумулятивний)
LanguageData.Ammo_SPG9Rocket_HEAT.description: Tube launched rocket-propelled grenade used by SPG-9 recoilless launcher and the BMP-1's 2A28 Grom cannon. After being fired, a rocket motor kicks in to propel the grenade further.
LanguageData.Ammo_SPG9Rocket_Thermobaric.label: реактивна граната СПГ9 (Термобаричний)
LanguageData.Ammo_SPG9Rocket_Thermobaric.description: Tube launched rocket-propelled grenade used by SPG-9 recoilless launcher and the BMP-1's 2A28 Grom cannon. After being fired, a rocket motor kicks in to propel the grenade further.
LanguageData.Ammo_SPG9Rocket_Frag.label: реактивна граната СПГ9 (Фугасний)
LanguageData.Ammo_SPG9Rocket_Frag.description: Tube launched rocket-propelled grenade used by SPG-9 recoilless launcher and the BMP-1's 2A28 Grom cannon. After being fired, a rocket motor kicks in to propel the grenade further.
LanguageData.Ammo_SPG9Rocket_EMP.label: реактивна граната СПГ9 (ЕМІ)
LanguageData.Ammo_SPG9Rocket_EMP.description: Tube launched rocket-propelled grenade used by SPG-9 recoilless launcher and the BMP-1's 2A28 Grom cannon. After being fired, a rocket motor kicks in to propel the grenade further.
